# galois
Golang implement of Galois fields math.

Compute over GF(2) to GF(24).

## Install

```
go get github.com/cmehay/galois
```

## How to Galois fields ?

Get instance of your desired GF(x)

```
import "github.com/cmehay/galois"

func main() {
  gf, err := galois.GF(8)
  ...
```

And compute

```
mul, err := gf.Mul(3, 4)
div, err := gf.Div(6, 43)
expon, err := gf.Expon(34, 9001)
```

## I've got over 9000 terrabytes of ram and I want to compute over GF(31)

Increase `MaxGF` const, change `primPoly` type to `uint64` and add desired primitive polynomials to the slice.

Here an awesome list for awesome polynomials

